name: The Long Road
description:
(I recommend playing on fullscreen)

This game is my entry for Ludum Dare 42: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/the-long-road

Objective: Get to the destination with as much treasure as possible.

Instructions:
• Left-click on items in the shop to buy them.
• Right-click on items in the wagon to sell them.
• Drag items outside of wagon to discart them.
• Click on items inside the wagon to use/equip them on selected hero.
• Click on enemies to attack them.
• Esc to close wagon
• Tab to restart the game
